reviews.text: My daughter started at Oliver Thomas Nursery and she had a great. I can't thank enough to Mrs Ramzana's efforts for making my daughter comfortable with school. Thanks Mrs Ramzana and Thanks Oliver Thomas nursery. I don't know about any other nurseries but for me this is the best.

Absolutely an outstanding nursery. Very accommodating to my sons needs and go above and beyond for every single parent and child. Lorna is the most welcoming headteacher I have ever met and is very much involved in everything! My son always loves seeing Lorna at the gates every single day come rain or shine. Johanna is always taking time out to discuss my child‚Äôs needs and is so approachable, making me feel at ease.  Finally my child‚Äôs key workers and other staff that are involved have been amazing and my son has made amazing progress that I‚Äôm so thankful for. Il be sending my daughter here soon!

Excellent peaceful family friendly place welcoming all the diverse people families and children of the world.

I am very sad to to live this nursery it is the best nursery in newham no one can bet it looked after my son kian and Supported him with his needs very Helpful and caring  stuff looked after me and my hole family thow lock down I am so sad to be moving we are going to miss u all a big thank u to Penguin room and panda room team u are amazing I we‚Äôll not for get the all u put in love from Nicola and kian
Staff are really good and professional. Susana one of the staff at the children centre has helped me so much during my difficult time. I cant thank her enough.

address: Oliver Thomas Children's Centre, Oliver Thomas Nursery School, 5 Mathews Ave, London E6 6BU, United Kingdom
